Age.Description: age of the participant in years

STAI_trait.Description: Trait anxiety from State-Trait Anxiety Inventory (STAI) (Spielberger, 1970)

STAI_state_pre_cond.Description: State anxiety before conditioning. State-Trait Anxiety Inventory (STAI) (Spielberger, 1970)

STAI_state_post_cond.Description: State anxiety after conditioning. State-Trait Anxiety Inventory (STAI) (Spielberger, 1970)

Harm_avoidance_TPQ.Description: harm avoidance scale from the tridimensional personality questionnaire (Cloninger, 1987)

IUS_factor1.Description: intolerance of uncertainty (IUS) scale (Freeston et al., 1994): factor 1 (Uncertainty has negative behavioural and self-referent implications) score

IUS_factor2.Description: intolerance of uncertainty (IUS) scale (Freeston et al., 1994): factor 2 (Uncertainty is unfair and spoils everything) score

IUS.Description: intolerance of uncertainty (IUS) scale (Freeston et al., 1994): overall score
